name: FreeThem
description:
A physics-based multiplayer or single-player game of a convict escaping prison. Play alone or with friends over IP and port forwarding! (17777 I believe...). Drag and drop gameplay mechanics inspired by Portal (but worse) and puzzle-solving aspects like Monument Valley. Play the puzzles to escape! Or be trapped in the prison forever...

The layout of the prison... We are almost free... Have fun escaping... ...or stay for a while...

Made for MFGJ 2021 Summer

GitHub: If you find any bugs or issues, please file a PR or make an issue on GitHub. I will also be checking comments. (There are still many issues with Multiplayer which I can't fix due to the time limit: eg. keys on the keypad not showing up)
